segments.text: Henry , don ’ t get out of doing housework .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s none of my business .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean that is my business .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t say that . But it seems to me the housewife should do that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m your wife , not a housewife . I have my own work .
segments.speaker: S1
